short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: From Columbus to Napoleon: Conquer huge empires, colonize uncharted continents and construct mighty monuments.
short.de: Von Kolumbus bis Napoleon: Erobere riesige Imperien, kolonisiere unbekannte Kontinente und baue mächtige Monumente.
short.es: De Colón a Napoleón: conquista gigantescos imperios, coloniza continentes sin explorar y erige poderosos monumentos.
short.fr: De Christophe Colomb à Napoléon : bâtissez d'immenses empires, colonisez des continents inexplorés et construisez des monuments…
short.pl: Od Kolumba do Napoleona: Podbijaj wielkie imperia, kolonizuj nieznane kontynenty i wznoś ogromne monumenty.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There are 10 different types of terrain, 3 unit branches and more than 150 technologies, which can be researched to improve different aspects of the empire (economy, colonization, warfare). A new unit cap system balances battles and makes smart army management all the more important.
